title: Opinion: Everything is changing in dementia diagnosis and treatment
description: When patients are diagnosed with Alzheimer’s, they and their families always want to know: What does that mean for the future?
content: When patients are diagnosed with Alzheimer’s, they and their families always want to know: What does that mean for the future?
